channel.title: Hitting NPC's is blue and not Red?

item.title: Hitting NPC's is blue and not Red?
item.dc:creator: @Keirc Keirc
item.description:
@Keirc wrote:

I edited some of the code here, because whenever I hit an enemy with a poisoned weapon, the rest of the hits I did until it died were green, what I did didnâ€™t fix it, however now, whenever I hit an NPC, the hit bubble is blue.
This following code is from NPC.java
All help appreciated,
Thanks guys.

[code] }

protected void appendHitUpdate(stream str) {		
    try {
        HP -= hitDiff;
        if (HP <= 0) {
            IsDead = true;
        }
        str.writeByteC(hitDiff); // What the perseon got 'hit' for
        if (hitDiff > 0 && !poisondmg) {
            str.writeByteS(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        } else if (hitDiff > 0 && poisondmg) {
            str.writeByteS(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        } else {
            str.writeByteS(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        }
        str.writeByteS(HP); // Their current hp, for HP bar
        str.writeByteC(MaxHP); // Their max hp, for HP bar
        poisondmg = false;
    } catch (Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}

protected void appendHitUpdate2(stream str) {		
    try {
        HP -= hitDiff;
        if (HP <= 0) {
            IsDead = true;
        }
        str.writeByteS(hitDiff); // What the perseon got 'hit' for
        if (hitDiff > 0 && !poisondmg) {
            str.writeByteC(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        } else if (hitDiff > 0 && poisondmg) {
            str.writeByteC(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        } else {
            str.writeByteC(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        }
        str.writeByteS(HP); // Their current hp, for HP bar
        str.writeByte(MaxHP); // Their max hp, for HP bar
        poisondmg = false;
    } catch (Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}

[/code]

Also, any help with fixing the poison problem will be great, thanks again.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2008, 07:51:36 AM[/size][hr]Ok, I fixed the NPC problem by making it this;

[code] }

protected void appendHitUpdate(stream str) {		
    try {
        HP -= hitDiff;
        if (HP <= 0) {
            IsDead = true;
        }
        str.writeByteC(hitDiff); // What the perseon got 'hit' for
        if (hitDiff > 0 && !poisondmg) {
            str.writeByteS(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        } else if (hitDiff > 0 && poisondmg) {
            str.writeByteS(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        } else {
            str.writeByteS(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        }
        str.writeByteS(HP); // Their current hp, for HP bar
        str.writeByteC(MaxHP); // Their max hp, for HP bar
        poisondmg = false;
    } catch (Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}

protected void appendHitUpdate2(stream str) {		
    try {
        HP -= hitDiff;
        if (HP <= 0) {
            IsDead = true;
        }
        str.writeByteS(hitDiff); // What the perseon got 'hit' for
        if (hitDiff > 0 && !poisondmg) {
            str.writeByteC(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        } else if (hitDiff > 0 && poisondmg) {
            str.writeByteC(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        } else {
            str.writeByteC(0); // 0: red hitting - 1: blue hitting
        }
        str.writeByteS(HP); // Their current hp, for HP bar
        str.writeByte(MaxHP); // Their max hp, for HP bar
        poisondmg = false;
    } catch (Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}[/code]

But I still really need help with the PvP Poison thing, thanks.
